mapper.insert:
select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review(num,userid,content,score,filename,wdate,pnum_fk) values(#{num},#{userid},#{content:VARCHAR},#{score}, #{filename:VARCHAR},sysdate,#{pnum_fk})
mapper.select: select * from review where pnum_fk=#{value} order by num desc
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, score=#{score} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(num) from review where pnum_fk=#{value}
